About Me

BIO

My passion lies in developing quality applications with clean, readable and maintainable codes. I am currently pursuing my bachelor degree in Computer Science in the National University of Singapore. I worked for two tech companies during my school years, one during summer, another over a period of six months. I am also an avid runner.

SP Digital (SP Group)

Software Engineer (May-Oct 2019)

I interned at this great company which aims to revolutionize the Energy Tech industry in Singapore. I worked on consumer-facing applications with hundreds of thousands of users.

ID Tech

Coding Instructor (Summer 2018)

I had the opportunity to teach programming at the tech education camp ID Tech when it first expanded to Singapore. I took it as a mission to spark interests in programming among children and teenagers. I taught basic HTML, CSS, Javascript, C++, Python and Java.
